response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This product boasts cutting-edge features and unparalleled performance, making it an invaluable asset for any organization looking to gain a competitive edge. Given its exceptional quality and innovative capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. However, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this game-changing product for an exclusive introductory price of $18,000. This is a limited-time offer, and I trust it will align well with your strategic goals and budget. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can arrange for immediate delivery and setup. Looking forward to potentially working with you on this exciting journey.", "product_price": 18000}
